translations: 专业潜水教练协会（Professional Association of Diving Instructors）

phrs.translation: 专业潜水教练协会, 国际专业潜水教练协会(Professional Association Of Diver Instructor), 潜水教练专业协会, 专业潜水训练协会
潜水长, 潜水长训练班

sentences.sentence: For domestic tourists, domestic PADI to obtain the license is not realistic.
sentences.translation: 对于国内的游客来讲，在国内考取PADI的执照是不太现实。

sentences.sentence: Unlimited diving with your very own personal PADI registered dive Instructor.
sentences.translation: 无限潜水与你自己的个人的PADI注册潜水教练。

sentences.sentence: I already had my PADI certificate, and all that sort of stuff. So that was great.
sentences.translation: 我已经有了PADI证书，以及所有那类东西。所以呢，那太棒了。
